jdbc-user-service.users-by-username-query: SELECT U.Person_Login, U.Person_Password, U.Activated AS "enabled" FROM persons U where U.Person_Login=?
jdbc-user-service.authorities-by-username-query: SELECT U.Person_Login, G.profile_code as "authority" FROM persons U , teammembers R,profiles G WHERE U.Person_ID = R.person_FK and R.profile_FK=G.Profile_ID and U.Person_Login=? limit 1
